Old Bestsellers Lists

Find your next read while it's still popular!

Have you ever wished that you could checkout a bestselling book from the library, only to find a waitlist a hundred patrons long? With our new tool, you can find your next read without a wait, right now!

Find a Bestseller

Our state of the art technology queries the New York Times Bestsellers list for fiction, to get a list of what's hot right now.

We then check your library or libraries of choice to determine whether a book is available. You get back a curated list of the most recent, yet available, books!

On the day you were born...

Ever wonder which book topped the charts on the day you were born? Use our tool to find a copy in the library, and be sure to share your findings on social media!

This Day in History

Learn about an event that happened this day in history, and get a list of that week's bestsellers, available in your library!
